prompt: I was charged twice for order #999 and the app keeps crashing when I try to contact support!
Where is my package? It was supposed to be here yesterday.
Hey, I tried to reset my password but the link you sent is broken. I need to login ASAP.
My credit card shows a charge of $50 but my receipt says $40. explain this immediately.
Order #12345 hasn't arrived yet. Tracking says delivered but I see nothing.
I returned the shoes two weeks ago and STILL no refund???
App keeps freezing on the checkout screen. This is ridiculous, I just want to buy the thing.
You guys sent me the wrong size. I ordered a medium and got an XL.
Why is my account locked? I didn't do anything wrong.
The promo code 'SAVE20' isn't working even though it says valid until tomorrow.
I need to cancel order #5555 but the cancel button is greyed out.
Package arrived completely crushed. The item inside is broken.
I've been waiting on hold for 30 minutes. Your support sucks.
Subscription renewed automatically but I thought I cancelled it last month. I want my money back.
Can't update my shipping address. It keeps reverting to the old one.
Received an email saying order shipped but the tracking number is invalid.
I got charged for the premium plan but I'm still seeing ads. Fix this now.
My screen goes black every time I open your app on iPhone.
Sent a gift to my friend but you put the price on the packing slip! thanks a lot.
Where is the refund for order #777? It's been 10 business days.
Login page gives me a 404 error. Is the site down?
I accidentally ordered two of the same item. Please remove one before it ships.
The driver left the package in the rain and now it's soaked.
Why does the app need access to my contacts? That seems shady.
I was promised a 10% discount for signing up but it wasn't applied to my cart.
Stop sending me so many marketing emails! I unsubscribed like five times.
My order is stuck in 'processing' for a week now. What is going on?
Payment failed but the money was taken from my bank account.
I can't find the logout button. The UI is terrible.
You shipped order #888 to my old house! I updated my profile last week!
Item is missing parts. The manual says there should be 4 screws, I only got 2.
Chat support bot is useless. I need to speak to a human being.
Your website is so slow today, I can't even browse products.
I want to return this but the return label link gives an error.
Charged $100 for a service I never signed up for. This is fraud.
The color of the shirt looks nothing like the picture. Very disappointed.
App crashes immediately after update. Fix it or I'm deleting.
Tracking says 'out for delivery' for 3 days. Did the driver steal it?
I need a VAT invoice for my company expenses but can't find where to download it.
Can u refund order #222? I bought it by mistake.
Search function is broken. I search for 'laptop' and get 'socks'.
My profile picture won't upload. It keeps saying 'server error'.
I ordered next-day delivery and it's been 3 days. refund my shipping cost.
The item description said wireless but this clearly has a wire. False advertising!
Cannot add new credit card. It says 'invalid request' every time.
Who signed for my package? I was at work and no one was home.
Got an overcharge alert from my bank. You took $120 instead of $12.
Delete my account. I can't find the option in settings.
The audio quality on this device is terrible, lots of static. refund pls.
Why can't I use PayPal? It was working yesterday.
